title: News24.com | WATCH LIVE | Health Minister briefs nation after meeting CEOs of private hospitals
description: Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and KZN MEC for Health Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu will give an update about a meeting with the CEOs of South Africa's private hospitals.
content:
10 April, 02:02 PM
Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and KwaZulu-Natal MEC for Health Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu will update the media on Friday following a meeting with the CEOs of South Africa's private hospitals. 
The briefing is expected to begin at 13:00.
